轖字的基本解释

轖
sè
古代车旁用皮革交错而成的障蔽物。

轖字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sè］
［《廣韻》所力切，入職，生。］
(1)古代车旁用皮革交错结成的障蔽物。
(2)涩，气结不畅。参见“轖舌”。

轖字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【車字部】　轖； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1249第08
【廣韻】所力切【集韻】殺側切，?音色。【說文】車籍交錯也。　又【集韻】重革之蔑所以覆軨也。　又氣結也。【枚乗·七發】中若結轖。

轖字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
轖字的起名意思

暂无。

leather top of a cart
Basic explanation of words
leather top of a cart
sè
A barrier made of staggered leather beside the ancient car.
leather top of a cart
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [sè]
["Guangyun" force cut, entry, birth. ]
(1) A barrier made of interlaced leather beside an ancient car.
(2) Astringent, poor qi. See "Long Tongue".
leather top of a cart
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Youjixia】【Car Character Department】　轖; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 1249 Page 08
[Guang Yun] cut by force [Ji Yun] cut to the side,? Tone. [Said the text] The car registration is also staggered.　[Jiyun] The contempt of the heavy revolution is so overwhelmed.　It's angry again. [Mei Cheng·Seven Hair] If the knot is in the middle.
